Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client

Interface LDAPSession

All Known Implementing Classes:
LDAPClientConnection
public interface LDAPSession
Operations available in an authenticated LDAP session.

This interface is provided to the handler in BindResultHandler.handleBindSuccess(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.LDAPSession) after a successful bind. It provides access to all LDAP directory operations.

LDAP supports concurrent operations - multiple requests can be outstanding at the same time, each identified by a message ID. The connection handles message ID correlation automatically.

After each operation completes, the callback receives this interface again, allowing the handler to continue with more operations or close the connection.

Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
  • BindResultHandler.handleBindSuccess(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.LDAPSession)

  • Method Details

    • search

      void search(SearchRequest request, SearchResultHandler callback)
      Performs a search operation.

      Search results are delivered incrementally:

      • SearchResultHandler.handleEntry(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.SearchResultEntry) for each matching entry
      • SearchResultHandler.handleReference(java.lang.String[]) for referrals
      • SearchResultHandler.handleDone(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.LDAPResult, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.LDAPSession) when search completes
      Parameters:
      request - the search request parameters
      callback - receives search results

    • modify

      void modify(String dn, List<Modification> modifications, ModifyResultHandler callback)
      Modifies an existing entry.

      The modifications map contains attribute names as keys and modification operations as values. Each modification specifies an operation type (add, delete, replace) and values.

      Parameters:
      dn - the distinguished name of the entry to modify
      modifications - the modifications to apply
      callback - receives the modify result

    • add

      void add(String dn, Map<String,List<byte[]>> attributes, AddResultHandler callback)
      Adds a new entry to the directory.
      Parameters:
      dn - the distinguished name for the new entry
      attributes - the attributes for the new entry
      callback - receives the add result

    • delete

      void delete(String dn, DeleteResultHandler callback)
      Deletes an entry from the directory.
      Parameters:
      dn - the distinguished name of the entry to delete
      callback - receives the delete result

    • compare

      void compare(String dn, String attribute, byte[] value, CompareResultHandler callback)
      Compares an attribute value in an entry.

      The result indicates whether the specified attribute in the entry contains the given value:

      • CompareResultHandler.handleCompareTrue(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.LDAPSession) if it matches
      • CompareResultHandler.handleCompareFalse(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.LDAPSession) if it doesn't
      Parameters:
      dn - the distinguished name of the entry
      attribute - the attribute name to compare
      value - the value to compare against
      callback - receives the compare result

    • modifyDN

      void modifyDN(String dn, String newRDN, boolean deleteOldRDN, ModifyDNResultHandler callback)
      Renames or moves an entry.
      Parameters:
      dn - the current distinguished name of the entry
      newRDN - the new relative distinguished name
      deleteOldRDN - whether to delete the old RDN attribute value
      callback - receives the modify DN result

    • modifyDN

      void modifyDN(String dn, String newRDN, boolean deleteOldRDN, String newSuperior, ModifyDNResultHandler callback)
      Renames or moves an entry to a new parent.
      Parameters:
      dn - the current distinguished name of the entry
      newRDN - the new relative distinguished name
      deleteOldRDN - whether to delete the old RDN attribute value
      newSuperior - the new parent DN (null to keep same parent)
      callback - receives the modify DN result

    • extended

      void extended(String oid, byte[] value, ExtendedResultHandler callback)
      Performs an extended operation.

      Extended operations allow protocol extensions beyond the core LDAP operations. Common examples include password modify and whoami operations.

      Parameters:
      oid - the OID identifying the extended operation
      value - the request value (may be null)
      callback - receives the extended operation result

    • rebind

      void rebind(String dn, String password, BindResultHandler callback)
      Re-binds with different credentials.

      This allows switching to a different user identity within the same connection. On success, a new LDAPSession is provided with the new identity.

      Parameters:
      dn - the distinguished name to bind as
      password - the password for authentication
      callback - receives the bind result

    • unbind

      void unbind()
      Closes the connection.

      Sends an unbind request and closes the connection. After calling this method, no further operations should be issued.
